summary.span: 用來針對開放式屬性執行晚期繫結作業。

span.span: Used to perform late-bound operations on open properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您實作 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 的自訂資料服務提供者時，便會使用此類別。This class is used when you implement a custom data service provider for [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].
